name: type_parent_get_highest_rated_investments
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ms_finance.
Tool description: This API helps to query financial summary, stocks, quotes, movers, news, etc... to create a site/application such as morningstar.com
API description: Retrieve the highest rated investments as displayed in the Parent tab.

type.description: The type of investment, one of the following values: 'etf' or 'fund'.

securityid.description: The security ID for which to retrieve the highest rated investments.
